Hi again everyone!

Here is part 2 of the pawn majority theme.  As before Chris kicks off with 1. d4 and I respond with d5.
2. ..... dxc4 - Queen's Gambit Accepted.  I have been inclined to accept gambits like these and have had mixed results.
